评论详情: Received so many compliments on this. Great value. Can wear so many ways. Fit was great and was flattering.

It's a $30 cheap coat made of thin, flimsy poly fabric so it doesn't hang or sit the way it is pictured. The color I received was WILDLY different from what was pictured- I ordered the maroon, and got a bright cherry red garment instead.  I'm not sure what's going on with the other reviews that have pictures- because what they received looks a lot more like the product photos and VERY different from what I received (maybe the listing is using photos of a different item). I'm glad I ordered a size up because this item is in chinese sizing (and therefore runs much smaller than US sizes)- so just a thing to be wary of when ordering. I was sent the supposed "right" equivalent size in the asian sizing (a size up from what was listed- i ordered a large thinking i'd just take it in and received an xl) but honestly I still think it runs a bit small (the sleeves were short) even with this adjustment.  The lapels/collar cannot possibly stand up straight the way they do in the photos as they have no interfacing and the fabric is -as mentioned- very thin and flimsy. This garment is also unlined so it's not likely to last very long. It's fine for my purposes (costume) but definitely not good for actual wear.  it's got strong "ordered from wish" vibes :/

This jacket is super cute. It is pretty and looks nice. It's a thin material and not warm at all, but looks nice and flows well. The buttons are medal. The size does run big.  My daughter in the photo is 14. She sews and did take it in a lot. She wears it all the time, and it works for casual outfits or as a semi formal jacket as shown. It's a good value for the price.

Bought for my daughter, it is light weight and well made.  She likes it and it fit true to size

评论概述: pear shaped people may want to order a size down
评论详情: Be aware that whatever size you order, this company will take it upon themselves to send you larger sizes  because they think the rest of the world must be huge. I had to order it twice to finally get something that didn't swim on me. The material is stretchy and has generous proportions to begin with. Great quality for a costume ( which is what I purchased it for) however I would never confuse this as being a real coat. That said, it's better quality, for the price, than any Halloween costume jacket I could have purchased locally.

I appreciate the length. It is very dramatic as a costume piece. I generally wear women's medium (US sizes) and ordered this as medium also -- fits great. The garment did have some loose threads here and there. The material is very lightweight-- more for costume wear than warmth.

Oh I love this jacket, style, and fit! I bought allllll colors. I plan to pair them with a sexy dress and heels. I’ll post pics later! Get them all. I’m 5 “6 186 pounds, big breasted so I got 2x and it fits perfect. The material is not too thick and not too thin. I really love the fact that the sleeves are long enough to cover my long arms!just trust your girl and get the jacket. Thank me later 😇
Too small, no response from seller for refund request.

评论概述: Tell me you rushed this without telling me.....
评论详情: I'm not a seamstress or an expert on sewing, so how could I immediately tell that this was rushed? Well the mistakes gave it all away. Buttons sewn in the wrong spot, sleeves too long, and my personal favorite, the belt was sewn on twisted. I had to remove the button, untwist the belt and sew it back on myself. If I wanted a DIY project, I'd have done that instead of buying this. Smh.

Cheap, thin, and costume like material. Way too expensive for what this is. I'd expect to see this at a 5 for $20 sale at a cheap outlet store.

We got it for a pirate musical coming up.

This jacket is made of light material, so it wouldn’t be the best coat for a really cold day, but for fashion and beauty, it’s perfect!!! I must say I went to put it on for the first time, and one of the buttons fell off, so that was disappointing, but I sewed it back on right away and she was good as new....but be sure to be careful with the buttons...they all seem to be loosely sewed on.  This has to be one of the most beautiful jackets I have purchased...it fits like a glove, front is beautiful, and it has a really cool belt that goes halfway around your waist...around the back, so it really gives the jacket a nice statement of class. It has pockets which are kind of big, but if you smooth them out, it doesn’t make your hips look huge. The pockets are well made, perfect for whatever you need to carry. The cut of the jacket is gorgeous. It comes down to my knees in the front, and as the fabric circles around to the back, it’s get longer and looks very regal. I almost didn’t get this jacket because we are halfway through winter already, but this will be a perfect jacket as the temperatures begin to slowly increase into spring.

This coat is going to work great as a base for my Halloween costume.  It's just a single layer of a knit polyester, so it's definitely not going to keep you warm.  I used the size chart provided and it's a little looser in the chest/torso than I wanted, but is probably right if you plan to wear layers under it.  It's what I expected for the price.
Very flattery to the figure. I loved this coat. It will get you a lot of attention

Thin fabric, but good for layers or warmer weather. No issues with buttons or seams after a few washes and wears. Lovely color and flattering fit. I’m 5’9 at 150 and a large is a good fit that isn’t too tight.

I returned it to amazon for a xxl and will simply have the waist and sleeves tailored. Maybe I’ll even add a thin lining!

评论概述: Buttons not attached well, waist small
评论详情: I like the jacket. It's not lined, which makes it more for costume than function. The arms are a bit tight, and upon touching one of the side buttons it popped off. Easily remedied, though frustrating. The sleeves are also a bit long. I am naturally a 38 inch waist, and had to wear a pretty tightly laced corset under the jacket to make it fit. The fabric makes for a great billow affect when walking!
The buttons ripped of on the first night she were it. Not good quality.

It is light weight which makes it perfect for shopping and practical for most of the year instead of a heavy wool coat.  There is no lining and it is machine washable and it can be put in the dryer.  I washed and dried mine and the wrinkles fell out and it didn't need to be ironed.  The fabric is soft and smooth and pet hair doesn't stick to it.  The fabric doesn't attract lint.  It is comfortable to wear and easy to maintain without an iron or a lint brush.  I bought a size large because it shipped from Amazon.  I usually wear a medium but the large fits well except the sleeves are a little bit too long which I don't mind. The sleeves would be easy to shorten.  The cuffs are just serged on which would be very easy to alter.

Gave this to my granddaughter for her Birthday and she really loved it. It fits well and is comfortable. The item shows high puff to the top of sleeves, and this is not accurate. There is not that much puff to the top of the sleeves
The trench coat is absolutely adorable! The fabric is soft and light weight, which is good . We live at the beach . I didn’t size up or down just went by the measurements given .
Followed the sizing chart ordered a 3xl (I wear a US 16) it’s at LEAST 6 inches smaller than the size chart listing. Very disappointed, buyer beware.

If it is 60 degrees or warmer it could be worn without additional garments for warmth.  I wont be wearing it at a coat unless a warm spring coat. Just mot pleased with the quality. May have to iron it to get wrinkles out before I wear it.  Will keep it but not order again.

I understand that this coat came from China (or maybe Japan) and sizing standards may be different there, but that should be made clear in the description of the product.  I didn't know when I ordered this coat that it was coming from another country.  I ordered a 3X and it was too small.  The size is more like a large in the standard sizing for the US.  the sleeves are too tight, the shoulders are tight, and it won't even close.  I love the style and the material but I can't wear it.

评论概述: THIS IS NOT A WARM COAT- but I love it!
评论详情: THIS IS NOT A COAT- but I love it. This is the light weight material of a dress. It is cut to fit close to the body NOT to fit over another layer of clothing. Dress size 4/6 ordered the small and it is snug but I wouldn’t want it any larger. If you size up to achieve a looser fit the button closure will not lay flat. The design of this item is created to be fitted - if you have a larger bust the chest closure will pull under the armpits. The hips are more of a free size because the cut opens up.
At first I thought it was not right for me, but when I tried it on I liked it. Actually I'm wearing it for a dress.
Love this coatdress. Get lots of compliments.  I ordered a large but got an extra large instead . So I just added a belt

评论概述: This is not a coat that will keep you warm
评论详情: I was looking for a winter trench coat and loved the look of this coat. Upon arrival I discovered there is no inner lining to help keep you warm! Also I ordered, using the size chart, what would be my size and not only found the coat too small but even if I had ordered one size larger it still would have been too small especially if I wore a sweater under it. If looks is what you're after, be sure to order 2 sized larger!

I usually wear 14-16 in pants and I ordered the 2xl and it fit me great. It was so comfortable. It worked perfect for my Regina from once upon a time Halloween costume. There was a funny smell when I took it out of package but I put it in the wash on hand wash delicate and then let it air dry and the smell went right away.
